browser = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="70fd753c0a032b929931879496f6ee9d")>

    def test_add_pizza_to_cart(browser):
        try:
            url = "https://pizzeria.skillbox.cc/"
            logger.info(f"Opening page: {url}")
            browser.get(url)
            allure.attach(browser.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="Main Page", attachment_type=AttachmentType.PNG)
    
            pizza_images = browser.find_elements(By.CLASS_NAME, 'pizza-image')
            logger.info(f"Found {len(pizza_images)} pizza images on the page")
    
            for pizza_image in pizza_images:
                actions = webdriver.ActionChains(browser)
                actions.move_to_element(pizza_image).perform()
    
                add_to_cart_btn = pizza_image.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR,
                                                           '.button.product_type_simple.add_to_cart_button')
                add_to_cart_btn.click()
                time.sleep(10)
    
    
            url_cart = "https://pizzeria.skillbox.cc/cart/"
            logger.info(f"Opening cart page: {url_cart}")
            browser.get(url_cart)
            allure.attach(browser.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="Cart Page", attachment_type=AttachmentType.PNG)
    
    
            pizza_items_in_cart = browser.find_elements(By.CLASS_NAME, 'cart_item')
            assert len(pizza_items_in_cart) > 0, "Пицца не найдена в корзине"
    
            logger.info("Pizza successfully added to cart")
    
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Error in the test: {e}")
            allure.attach(browser.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="Error", attachment_type=AttachmentType.PNG)
